text: Mandana is a given name of the following people *Mandana Dayani, American branding, technology, and fashion expert *Mandana Jones, British actress *Mandana Karimi, Iranian actress and model *Abigail Mandana Holmes Christensen (1852–1938), American collector of folklore *Maṇḍana Miśra, 8th century Hindu philosopher *Mandana Moghaddam, Iranian-Swedish visual artist * Mandana Seyfeddinipur, Iranian linguist
title: Mandana (given name)
